tagline: Confronta liste multiple con diff avanzato e operazioni set
pageDescription: Strumento confronto liste professionale con operazioni set (unione, intersezione, differenza), matching fuzzy e formati output developer-friendly. Confronta fino a 10 liste simultaneamente con algoritmi intelligenti per dipendenze pacchetti, file git, endpoint API e analisi dati. Funzionalit√† diagrammi Venn, matching regex, rilevamento duplicati ed export JSON, CSV, SQL. Perfetto per sviluppatori, data analyst e amministratori sistema che gestiscono liste, array e dataset.

instructions.title: How to use Confronto Liste

steps.title: Paste your content
steps.description: Copy and paste your content into the input area. The tool accepts any format and will process it immediately.

steps.title: Configure options (if available)
steps.description: Adjust formatting options, indentation, or other settings to match your preferences and coding standards.

steps.title: Review the output
steps.description: The tool will process your input and display the result with proper formatting and validation.

steps.title: Copy or download result
steps.description: Copy the processed output to your clipboard for immediate use or download it as a file for storage and sharing.
